sections.heading: marketing plan; service of process
sections.text: Selling or offering to sell a seller-assisted marketing plan in this state shall constitute sufficient contact with this state for the exercise of personal jurisdiction over the seller in any action arising under the Seller-Assisted Marketing Plan Act.SourceLaws 19

59-1750.Seller-assisted marketing plan; service of process.

Selling or offering to sell a seller-assisted marketing plan in this state shall constitute sufficient contact with this state for the exercise of personal jurisdiction over the seller in any action arising under the Seller-Assisted Marketing Plan Act.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 180, ยง 50;Laws 1983, LB 447, ยง 77;Laws 1993, LB 218, ยง 18.
